headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Earn Double GTA$ in Short Trips
content:
Help get Lamar’s legal marijuana business off the ground in Short Trips and earn 2X GTA$. To launch these unique out-of-body experiences, visit the smoking room of Record A Studios or select them from the Jobs menu.

Complete a Short Trip anytime this week and you’ll receive a lump sum bonus of GTA$100K (delivered within 72 hours of completion).
